template.template: Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP
template.name: Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP
template.description:
Pantum mono laser multifunction printer template v1.2
Compatible models: - M6700DW (FW 3.A.0.3) - M7100DN (FW 3.6.1.4) - M7100DW (FW 2.A.1.3)
No private MIB-file found, reverse engeneering used
https://github.com/zbx-sadman/zabbix-templates/tree/main/Printers/Pantum

item.name: Catrirdge resource (%)
item.description:
Printer information page -> Consumables information -> Remaining amount of Toner
The same than .1.3.6.1.4.1.40093.1.1.3.13.2 and .1.3.6.1.4.1.40093.10.1.5.2.1.3.4

item.name: Cartridge status
item.description: 0 - ok 1 - error (not installed) ?? Probaly the same that 1.3.6.1.4.1.40093.10.1.5.2.1.7.4

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.status)=1
trigger.name: No cartridge installed

item.name: Cartridge prints total
item.description: Printer information page -> Consumables information -> Ink cartridge has been printed pages

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.wear_per_hour)>{$CARTRIDGE.WEAR.PER.HOUR.MAX}
trigger.name: Cartridge weared too fast
trigger.event_name: Cartridge weared more than {$CARTRIDGE.WEAR.PER.HOUR.MAX}% per hour

item.name: Drum status
item.description: 0 - ok 1 - error (not installed) ?? probaly the same that 1.3.6.1.4.1.40093.10.1.5.3.1.6

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.status)=1
trigger.name: No drum unit installed

item.name: Pages printed on A4
item.description: Printer information page -> Print information -> A4/Letter

item.name: Pages printed on auto-duplex
item.description: Printer information page -> Print information -> Pages printed with automatic duplex

item.name: Pages printed on other size
item.description: Printer information page -> Print information -> Others

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.page.printed_per_hour)>{$PAGES.PRINTED.PER.HOUR.MAX}
trigger.name: Page printed too fast
trigger.event_name: Page printed more than {$PAGE.PRINTED.PER.HOUR.MAX} per hour

item.name: Pages printed total
item.description: Printer information page -> Print information -> Total pages printed

item.name: Papier status
item.description:
0 - ok 131 - no papier
Note: papier.status == 0 if no papier and no cartridg / drum unit simultaneously

item.name: Printer status
item.description: 1 - sleep 2 - warming up 3 - ready 5 - print unit error - no drum / cartridge / opened front cover (?)

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.status)<>1 and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.status)<>2 and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.status)<>3 and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.status)<>5
trigger.name: Print unit unknown state (please add to template)

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: Printer information page -> Product information -> Firmware version

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/system.fw.version,#1)<>last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/system.fw.version,#2) and length(last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/system.fw.version))>0
trigger.name: Firmware has changed
trigger.description: Firmware version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: Hardware model name
item.description: Printer information page -> Product information -> Product name

item.name: Hardware serial number
item.description: Printer information page -> Product information -> Serial number

item.name: Sleep time
item.description: Printer information page -> System settings -> Sleep time

item.name: Memory size
item.description: Printer information page -> Product information -> Memory size

item.name: System state
item.description:
1 - idle 2 - sleeping 3 - warming up 6 - printing (or 4?) 7 - scanning
501 - error / no cartridge or drum 502 - error / front cover opened 503 - error / no papier

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/system.state)=502
trigger.name: Front cover opened

trigger.expression: max(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/zabbix[host,snmp,available],{$SNMP.TIMEOUT})=0
trigger.name: No SNMP data collection

item_prototype.name: Cartridge model
item_prototype.description: Printer information page -> Consumables information -> Ink cartridge type

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.serial_number[{#SINGLETON}],#1)<>last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.serial_number[{#SINGLETON}],#2) and length(last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.serial_number[{#SINGLETON}]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: Cartridge has changed
trigger_prototype.description: Cartridge has changed. Ack to close.

item_prototype.name: Drum model
item_prototype.description: Printer information page -> Consumables information -> Drum unit type

item_prototype.name: Drum resource (%)
item_prototype.description: Printer information page -> Consumables information -> Drum unit remainder

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.serial_number[{#SINGLETON}],#1)<>last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.serial_number[{#SINGLETON}],#2) and length(last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.serial_number[{#SINGLETON}]))>0
trigger_prototype.name: Drum has changed
trigger_prototype.description: Drum has changed. Ack to close.

trigger_prototype.expression: max(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.resource[{#SINGLETON}],#3)<{$DRUM.RESOURCE.MIN.CRIT} and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.status)<>1
trigger_prototype.name: Drum resource is critical low

dependency.name: Drum resource is low
dependency.expression: max(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.resource[{#SINGLETON}],#3)<{$DRUM.RESOURCE.MIN.WARN} and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.status)<>1

trigger_prototype.expression: max(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.resource[{#SINGLETON}],#3)<{$DRUM.RESOURCE.MIN.WARN} and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.status)<>1
trigger_prototype.name: Drum resource is low

dependency.name: No drum unit installed
dependency.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.status)=1

macro.description: Low critical level of cartridge resource (toner)
Low warning level of cartridge resource (toner)
Trigger's threshold for cartridge wearing (per hour)
Low critical level of drum unit resource
Low warning level of drum unit resource
Trigger's threshold for printed pages (per hour)

trigger.expression: max(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.resource,#3)<{$CARTRIDGE.RESOURCE.MIN.CRIT} and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.status)<>1
trigger.name: Cartridge resource is critical low

dependency.name: Cartridge resource is low
dependency.expression: max(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.resource,#3)<{$CARTRIDGE.RESOURCE.MIN.WARN} and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.status)<>1

trigger.expression: max(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.resource,#3)<{$CARTRIDGE.RESOURCE.MIN.WARN} and last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.status)<>1
trigger.name: Cartridge resource is low

dependency.name: No cartridge installed
dependency.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.status)=1

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/system.state)=501 or last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.drum.status)=1 or last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.cartridge.status)=1
trigger.name: No cartridge or drum unit installed

trigger.expression: last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/system.state)=503 or last(/Pantum mono laser multifunction printer by SNMP/printer.papier_status)=131
trigger.name: No papier on feeder
